channel.title: What does this do?

item.title: What does this do?
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

I found this in my NPC.java commented out. (562 Server)

if(this.getLocation().getX() > p.getLocation().getX()) {
			moveX = -1;
		} else if(p.getLocation().getX() > this.getLocation().getX()) {
			moveX = 1;
		}
		if(this.getLocation().getY() > p.getLocation().getY()) {
			moveY = -1;
		} else if(p.getLocation().getY() > this.getLocation().getY()) {
			moveY = 1;
		}
		if(moveX == 0 && moveY == 0) {
			moveY = -1;
		}
		if(this.getLocation().getDistance(p.getLocation()) == Math.sqrt(2)) {
			if(moveX == moveY) {
				moveY = 0;
			} else {
				moveX = 0;
			}
		}

Read full topic
